venue.name: Cambridge Innovation Center (CIC) - 14th Floor - Charles Room

item.description:
There are two Boston study groups now, so how about one in Cambridge too? My office building in Kendall Square is generously offering the use of their conference room for our language group for free. So let's give it a try.

People of all levels of fluency are welcome. Please feel free to bring any study materials to share with the group. After the meetup, if enough people are interested, we can walk over to a local restaurant for dinner.


HOW TO GET THERE:
The best way to get here is to use the T. The office building is right next to the Red Line Kendall Square stop, across street from the Microsoft building. You can exit from the east end after you get off the train.

Once you are in the lobby, please show your ID to the receptionist for a visitor's pass. Then take the elevator to the 14th Floor. The concierge can open the door for you before 5:30. There will also be a sign on the door with directions and a phone number. You can use the lobby phone to call me to open the door.

If you drive, you can park at the Garage (hourly parking) attached to the building. Street parking nearby is very limited.
item.name: Cambridge study group
